name: Dungerous Quest
description:
I am developing this game on my own using 0 budget and free assets I find on the Store or Online, so I am an going to credit the artists when the game is finished.

I need funds to continue the development, so that I can hire professional artists and make better models and sounds.

If you can't help with the funds then I need help with feedback, like increasing the damage or reducing it and stuff, so please try the game and let me know what you think
